894380.name: Exoplanet: A Project Coreward Demo
894380.description:
Welcome to another galaxy. This demo of Project Coreward is an open world role playing adventure with limited gameplay.

Upgrade your ship. Assemble and train its crew. Their mission? To survive, explore and eventually uncover the ancient choices that now weigh darkly on the fate of every world.

Project Coreward features an extensive galaxy created for VR. Guide your ship through the stars in 3rd person and explore large scale solar systems and vast, walkable planets. Recruit crewmembers, engage in diplomacy and combat, and upgrade your skills and your vessel to survive.

Project Coreward is inspired by the classic PC sandbox adventure, Starflight and is the work of a sole developer. This demo features approximately 1.5 hours of story driven gameplay, with a unique plotline and personality.
894380.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
